Detailed Description

A device for checking a Boolean expression to see if it is a Tautology.

A TautologyChecker checks if an Expression object is a Tautology by exhaustively substituting all possible truth values for the variables in the Expression.

Member Function Documentation

LookupTable TautologyChecker::get_vars (   )  const [inline]
 

Get "offending" set of variables.

If result() yields false, this returns a LookupTable with a setting of the variables that yield false for the expression.

Returns:
a LookupTable with the offending set of variables.
